titleStmt.title: Edition by Tripathi and Negi
In Hevajratantra with Muktāvalī Pañjikā of Mahāpaṇḍitācārya Ratnākaraśānti
titleStmt.editor: Ram Shankar Tripathi and Thakur Sain Negi

publicationStmt.publisher: Central Institute of Higher Tibetan Studies

div.p: oṃ namaḥ śrīhevajrāya ||
evaṃ mayā śrutam | ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahṛdayavajrayoṣidbhageṣu vijahāra || 1 ||

tatra bhagavān āha—sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahṛdayaṃ bhaṭṭārakaṃ guhyātiguhyataraṃ iti | aho vajragarbha sādhu sādhu mahākṛpa mahābodhisattva [bodhisattvasya] vajrasattvasya mahāsattvasya samayasattvasya [jñānasattvasya] hṛdayaṃ hevajrākhyaṃ śṛṇu || 2 ||

lg.l: vajrasattvo bhavet kasmāt mahāsattvo bhavet katham |
samayasattvo bhavet kena kathayatu bhagavān mayi || 3 ||
abhedyaṃ vajram ity uktam sattvaṃ tribhavasyaikatā |
anayā prajñayā yuktyā vajrasattva iti smṛtaḥ || 4 ||
hevajraṃ tu bhavet kena īdṛśaṃ nāmasaṃgraham |
hekāreṇa kim ākhyātaṃ vajreṇāpi kim ucyate || 6 ||
hekāreṇa mahākaruṇā vajraṃ prajñā ca bhaṇyate |
prajñopāyātmakaṃ tantraṃ tan me nigaditaṃ śṛṇu || 7 |
bhāvaṃ bhāvyaṃ bhavet prājña abhāvaṃ ca parijñayā |
tadvac chrīherukaṃ bhāvyaṃ abhāvaṃ ca parijñayā || 11 ||

p.l: vajragarbha āha—he bhagavan ! vajradehe katamā nāḍyaḥ |
bhagavān āha—dvātriṃśan nāḍyaḥ | dvātriṃśad bodhicittāvahā mahāsukhasthāne sravante | tāsāṃ madhye tisro nāḍyaḥ pradhānāḥ | lalanā rasanā avadhūtī ceti || 13 ||

lg.l: abhedyā sūkṣmarūpā ca divyā vāmā tu vāminī |
kūrmajā bhāvakī sekā doṣā viṣṭā ca mātarī || 16 ||
pravaṇā kṛṣṇavarṇā ca surūpiṇī sāmānyā hetudāyikā || 17 ||
viyogā premaṇī siddhā pāvakī sumanās tathā |

div.p: vajragarbha uvāca—etā dvātriṃśan nāḍyo bhagavan kīdṛśāḥ || 19 ||
saṃvarabhedaś ca kathyate—āli-kāli-candra-sūrya-prajñopāya-dharma-saṃbhoga-nirmāṇa-mahāsukha-kāya-vāk-cittam | evaṃ mayā || 21 ||

lg.l: ekāreṇa locanā devī vaṃkāreṇa māmakī smṛtā |
makāreṇa pāṇḍurā ca yākāreṇa tāraṇī smṛtā || 22 ||

div.p: nirmāṇacakre padmaṃ catuḥṣaṣṭidalam | dharmacakre aṣṭadalam | saṃbhogacakre ṣoḍaśadalam | mahāsukhacakre dvātriṃśaddalam | cakrasaṃkhyākrameṇa vyavasthāpanam || 23 ||
catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ—vicitra-vipāka-vimarda-vilakṣaṇāś ceti || 24 ||
catvāry aṅgāni—sevā-upasevā-sādhanā-mahāsādhanāś ceti || 25 ||
caturāryasatyāni—duḥkha-samudaya-nirodha-mārgāś ceti || 26 ||
catvāri tattvāni—ātmatattvaṃ-mantratattvaṃ-devatātattvaṃ-jñānatattvaṃ ceti || 27 ||
catvāra ānandāḥ—ānandaḥ paramānando viramānandaḥ sahajānandaś ceti || 28 ||
catvāro nikāyāḥ—sthāvarī sarvāstivādaḥ saṃvidī mahāsaṅghī ceti || 29 ||
candra-sūrya āli-kāli ṣoḍaśasaṃkrāntiś catuḥṣaṣṭidaṇḍo dvātriṃśannāḍī catvāraḥ praharā evaṃ sarve catvāraḥ || 30 ||

lg.l: dahati ca locanādīḥ dagdhe haṃ sravate śaśī || 31 ||

div.p: iti sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahevajrakulapaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ |

mantrapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ—
sārvabhautikabalimantraḥ—oṃ akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvāt—oṃ āḥ hūṁ phaṭ svāhā || 1 ||
tathāgatānāṃ bījam—buṃ aṃ jrīṃ khaṃ hūṃ || 2 ||
hevajrasya hṛdayaṃ—oṃ deva picuvajra hūṁ hūṁ hūṁ phaṭ svāhā || 3 ||
sarvamantrapadāḥ—oṃ kārādi svāhāntā hūṁ phaṭkāra vidarbhitāḥ || 4 ||
purakṣobhamantraḥ—oṃ a ka ca ṭa ta pa ya śa svāhā || 5 ||
yoginīnāṃ bījaṃ—a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai o au aṃ aḥ || 6 ||
dvibhujasya—oṃ trailokyākṣepa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā || 7 ||
caturbhujasya—oṃ jvala jvalabhyo hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā || 8 ||
ṣaḍbhujasya—oṃ kiṭi kiṭi vajra hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā || 9 ||
kāyavākcittādhiṣṭhānamantraḥ—oṃ āḥ hūṃ || 10 ||
bhūmiśodhanamantraḥ—oṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā || 11 ||
stambanam—oṃ hūṁ svāhā || 12 ||
vaśyam—oṃ aṃ svāhā || 13 ||
uccāṭanam—oṃ khaṃ svāhā || 14 ||
vidveṣaṇam—oṃ jrīṃ svāhā || 15 ||
abhicārukam—oṃ buṃ svāhā || 16 ||
ākarṣaṇam—oṃ hūṃ svāhā || 17 ||
māraṇam—oṃ ghuḥ svāhā || 18 ||
oṃ kurukulle hrīḥ svāhā || 19 ||

oṃ āḥ phuḥ kāram anantapratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā pañcāmṛtena snāpayet | kṛṣṇapuṣpeṇārcayet | nāgadamanakarasena lepayet | hastimadena śiro lepayet | śarāvadvayena saṃpuṭīkṛtya sthāpayet | kṛṣṇagokṣīreṇa pūrayet | kṛṣṇakumārīkartitasūtreṇa veṣṭayet | vāyavyāṃ diśi puṣkariṇīṃ kṛtvā tam anantaṃ sthāpayet |
tasyās taṭe maṇḍalaṃ vartayet | kṛṣṇarajaḥ śmaśānāṅgāreṇa sitarajo narāsthicūrṇena pītarajo haritālakena raktarajaḥ śmaśāneṣṭakena haritarajaś cauryapatranarāsthicūrṇābhyāṃ nīlarajo narāsthiśmaśānāṅgāracūrṇābhyāṃ rajobhir ebhir maṇḍalaṃ vartayitvā śmaśānasūtreṇa saṃsūtrya trayahastaṃ maṇḍalaṃ tryāṅguṣṭhādikam | tanmadhye 'nantākrāntaṃ hevajraṃ likhet | aṣṭāsyaṃ catuścaraṇaṃ bhujaṣoḍaśabhūṣitam |
caturviṃśatinetrādyaṃ *bhayasyāpi bhayaṅkaram* ||
paścād ācāryo 'dhyātmakrūracetasā mantraṃ japed vijane deśe |
oṃ ghuru ghuru ghuḍu ghuḍu masa masa ghaṭa ghaṭa ghoṭaya ghoṭaya |
anantakṣobhakarāya nāgādhipataye he he ru ru ka saptapātālagatān nāgān karṣaya karṣaya varṣaya varṣaya garjaya garjaya phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ phuḥ hūṁ hūṁ hūṁ phaṭ svāhā |
yadi na varṣanti tadā etan mantraṃ viparītaṃ japet | varṣanti | yadi na varṣanti tadā mūrdhā sphuṭati arjakasyeva mañjarī | varṣāyan (varṣāpaṇa) vidhiḥ || 20 ||
meghānāṃ sphāṭanaṃ vakṣye | śmaśānakarpaṭa upaviśya mantrajapena sphāṭayet | oṃ āryaśmaśānapriyāya hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā | meghasphāṭanavidhiḥ || 21 ||

parasainyavināśāya khaṭikāsādhanaṃ vakṣye | khaṭikāṃ piṣṭvā pañcāmṛtena kuṭhāracchinnayā sārdhaṃ vaṭikāṃ kārayet | mantraḥ—oṃ vajrakartari hevajrāya hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ | siddhyarthaṃ koṭiṃ japet | pūrvasevāṃ lakṣaṃ japet | tāṃ sādhya kamaṇḍalugrīvāṃ veṣṭayet | veṣṭayitvā bhañjayet | sarve śatravaḥ śirohīnā bhavanti | vajrakartarividhiḥ || 22 ||

devān sphāṭayitukāmena tilakaṃ sādhanīyam | brahmabījaṃ puṣyasādhitaṃ kuṭhāracchinnāmiśritaṃ sūryagrāse akṣobhyena piṣayet | piṣṭvā paraśuṃ saṃskaret | taṃ pādenākramya mantraṃ japet |
oṃ vajrakuṭhāra pāṭaya pāṭaya hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā | koṭiṃ japya tilakaṃ vandayet | yaṃ ca lagati sa sphuṭati | devatāsphāṭanavidhiḥ || 23 ||

tāpajvaraṃ kartukāmena arkadale viṣarājikāra(la)vaṇacitrakarasena śatror nāma likhet | tuṣāgnau nikṣipet | mantram ayutaṃ japet |
oṃ hevajra jvala jvala śatrūn bhrūṃ hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā | ayutajāpena sidhyati || 24 ||
madyam udgiritukāmena sādhyasya nābhau maṃkāraṃ bhāvayet | maṃkāraniṣpannaṃ madyodaraṃ vibhāvayet | vāntiṃ kurvan dṛṣyate | madyam udgirati || 25 ||

pramadāṃ vaśīkartukāmena aśokāṣṭamyām aśokatalaṃ gatvāraktavastraṃ paridhāya madanaphalaṃ bhakṣayet | kāmācikārasena tilakaṃ vandya mantraṃ japet | oṃ hrīḥ amukī me vaśībhavatu svāhā | ayutajāpenāgacchati || 26 ||

candrasūryau vaśīkartukāmena śālipiṣṭakamayaṃ candrārkaṃ kṛtvā vajrodake nikṣipet | mantraṃ japet | oṃ candrārka mā cala mā cala tiṣṭha tiṣṭha hevajrāya hūṁ hūṁ hūṁ phaṭ svāhā | saptakoṭiṃ japet | tiṣṭhate | candrasūryaṃ rātriṃ divā'viśeṣakaṃ bhavati | iti candrasūryavidhāraṇavidhiḥ || 27 ||

oṃ nagrā nagrā | ity anena mantreṇa vikālavelāyāṃ kumāryārthasādhanārthaṃ cakṣuṣy aṣṭottaraśatenābhimantrya puṣpadhūpadīpānāṃ pañcopacāreṇa saṃpūjya nimantrayet | *caturdaśyām aṣṭamyāṃ vā prabhātakāle kalaśādikaṃ saṃsthāpya tailam alaktakarasaṃ cānenaiva mantreṇāṣṭottaraśatavārān abhimantrayet* | paścād abhimantritālaktakarasena mantriṇo vṛddhāṅguṣṭhaṃ mrakṣayitvā tailenāpi snāpya kumāryān darśayet | vada kena mama dravyam apahṛtam iti | tatra sa kathayati | amukeneti vajrajyotiṣo naṣṭadravyānveṣaṇavidhiḥ || 28 ||
oṃ veḍuyā veḍuyā ity ukte hastī palāyate || 29 ||
oṃ marmā marmā ity ukte vyāghraḥ palāyate || 30 ||
oṃ teliyā teliyā ity ukte gaṇḍā palāyate || 31 ||
ili mili phuḥ phuḥ ity ukte sarpaḥ palāyate || 32 ||

dhanapāla vaineyahastena hastaṃ darśayet |
śvā palāyate || 33 ||

lg.l: vajrā gaurī ca vārī ca vajraḍākī nairātmikā |
bhūcarī khecarī yogāt stambhanādi kared vratī || 34 ||

div.p: mantrapaṭalo dvitīyaḥ |

lg.l: prathamaṃ bhāvayen maitrīṃ dvitīye karuṇāṃ tathā |

tasmāt punar api
prathamaṃ śūnyatābodhiṃ dvitīyaṃ bījasaṃgraham |

tataḥ
svahṛdi bhāvayed rephaṃ tadbhavaṃ sūryamaṇḍalam |
athavā nīlāruṇābhaṃ ca bhāvayec chandayā khalu || 7 ||
pukkasī vajrahastā ca śavarī rasadharī tathā |
caṇḍālī ḍamaruṃ vādya etābhiḥ pūjyate prabhuḥ |
sa eva sattva ity āhuḥ paramānandasvabhāvakaḥ || 11 ||
cakrī kuṇḍala kaṇṭhī ca haste rucakamekhalā |
vāme vajrakapālaṃ ca khaṭvāṅgaṃ cāpi vāmataḥ |

div.p: caturbhujaś caturmāranirjitaviśuddhitaḥ | pūrvoktavarṇarūpo hūṁbhavaḥ prathamavāmabhuje narakapālaṃ devāsurānāṃ raktena pūritaṃ prathamadakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ śeṣadvibhujābhyāṃ prajñāliṅgitaḥ | vajravārāhī prajñā bhagavadrūpiṇī || 17 ||

ṣaḍbhujas trimukho vāmaṃ raktaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ candrāruṇābhaṃ prathamaṃ nīlam | nagnoḥ (gnaḥ) pūrvoktavarṇarūpo bhujānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāviśuddhiḥ | prathamavāmabhuje triśūlaṃ prathamadakṣiṇabhuje vajraṃ vāmadvitīyabhuje ghaṇṭā
dakṣiṇadvitīyabhuje kartiḥ | śeṣadvibhujābhyāṃ vajraśṛṅkhalāsamāpannaḥ | yadvad bhagavān tadvat prajñā | savyāpasavye kartṛkapālam | traidhātukātmakamṛtakākrāntaḥ || 18 ||
sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittahevajradevatāpaṭalas tṛtīyaḥ ||

devatābhiṣekapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ—
svahṛdi svabījād raśmiṃ niścārya krṣṇadīptayāṅkuśākārayā traidhātukavyavasthitān buddhān ākṛṣyāṣṭamātṛbhiḥ saṃpūjyānunāyayati | oṃ abhiṣiñcantu māṃ sarvatathāgatā iti || 1 ||

tair buddhair herukākārarūpaiḥ pañcāmṛtabhṛtaiḥ pañcatathāgatātmakaiḥ kalaśaiḥ pañcabhir abhiṣicyate | abhiṣicyamāne puṣpavṛṣṭir bhavati |
dundubhiśabda uccalati kuṅkumavṛṣṭir bhavati || 2 ||

rūpavajrādibhiḥ saṃpūjyate | vajragītyo locanādibhir gīyante | abhiṣicyamāne mūrdhni svakuleśo bhavati | etena heruko niṣpannaḥ trisaṃdhyādhiṣṭhānabhāvanāṃ vibhāvyottiṣṭhet | devatāmūrtyā sthātavyam || 3 ||
abhiṣekapaṭalaś caturthaḥ |

atha tattvapaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | svarūpeṇa—
nāsti rūpaṃ na draṣṭā ca na śabdo nāpi śrotā ca |
na gandho nāpi ghrātā ca na raso nāpi rāsakaḥ |
na sparśo nāpi spraṣṭā ca na cittaṃ nāpi caittikam || 1 ||

lg.l: jananīṃ bhaginīṃ caiva pūjayed yogavit sadā |
naṭīṃ ca rajakīṃ vajrāṃ caṇḍālīṃ brāhmaṇīṃ tathā |
sevitavyāḥ prayatnena yathā bhedo na jāyate |
vajra padma tathā karma tathāgata ratnaiva ca |
vajre ḍombī bhaven mudrā padme nartī tathaiva ca |
karmaṇi rajaky āhyātā brāhmaṇī ca tathāgate || 6 ||
tathatāyāṃ gataḥ śrīmān āgataś ca tathaiva ca |
kulāni ṣaḍvidhāny āhuḥ saṃkṣepeṇa tu pañcadhā |
nāsti bhāvako na bhāvo 'sti mantraṃ nāsti na devatā |
brahmā viṣṇuḥ śivaḥ sarvo vibuddhas tattvam ucyate || 12 ||
brahmā nirvṛtito buddhaḥ viṣaṇād viṣṇur ucyate |
śivaḥ sadā sukalyāṇāt sarvaḥ sarvātmani sthitaḥ || 13 ||
satsukhatvena tattvaṃ ca vibuddho bodhanāt rateḥ |
jananī bhaṇyate prajñā janayati yasmāj jagat |
bhaginīti tathā prajñā vibhāgaṃ darśayed yathā || 16 ||
rajakīti duhitā ca nartakī ca prakathyate |
guṇasya duhanāt prajñā duhitā ca nigadyate |
asparśā bhagavatī yasmāt tasmād ḍombī prakathyate || 18 ||
maṇḍalaṃ pādalekhaḥ syān malanād maṇḍalam ucyate || 19 ||
tad dhyeyaṃ cintitaṃ yac ca dhyānaṃ yasmād vicintanam || 20 ||
pitari prāptaṃ yat saukhyaṃ tat sukhaṃ bhujyate svayam |
maraṇaṃ yena sukhena tat sukhaṃ dhyānam ucyate || 21 ||

div.p: tattvapaṭalaḥ pañcamaḥ ||

lg.l: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi caryāṃ pāraṅgatāṃ varām |
kaṭyāṃ vā mekhalaṃ caiva pādayor nūpuraṃ tathā |
ekavṛkṣe śmaśāne vā bhāvanā kathyate śubhā |
kiñcid ūṣme tu saṃprāpte caryāṃ kartuṃ yadīṣyate |
siddhiṃ gantuṃ yadīcchāsti caryayā tv anayā caret || 7 ||
vajrakanyām imāṃ gṛhya caryāṃ kartuṃ vibudhyate || 8 ||

div.p:
vajrakulābhāvāt sveṣṭadevakulena krīyate |
athavānyakulodbhavā
bodhibījanikṣepeṇa saṃskṛtām imāṃ gṛhṇīyat || 9 ||

lg.l: yadi gītaṃ gīyata ānandāt tarhi vajrānvitaṃ param |
tarhi vajrapadaiḥ nāṭyaṃ kuryād yogī samāhitaḥ || 10 ||
mantraviśuddhyā sthitā gītā nartanā bhāvanā smṛtā |
tasmād gītañ ca nāṭyañ ca kuryād yogī sadā sadā || 13 ||
bhakṣitavyaṃ tu bhaiṣajyaṃ pātavyaṃ vāri nityatām |
jarāmṛtyur na bādheta rakṣābhūtaḥ sadā bhavet || 14 ||
bhasma keśapavitraṃ ca yogī vibharti caryayā || 16 ||
lobhaṃ mohaṃ bhayaṃ krodhaṃ vrīḍākāryañ ca varjayet |
nidrām ātmānam utsṛjya caryāṃ kuryān na saṃśayaḥ || 18 ||
śarīraṃ dānaṃ datvā ca paścāc caryāṃ samārabhet |
bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ tathā pānaṃ yathāprāptaṃ tu bhakṣayet |
gamyāgamyaṃ tathā mantrī vikalpaṃ naiva kārayet || 21 ||
śakratulyo 'pi yo daityaḥ purato bhavati niścitam |
bhayaṃ tatra na kurvīta siṃharūpeṇa paryaṭet || 25 ||

div.p: caryāpaṭalaḥ ṣaṣṭḥaḥ |

atha chomāpaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ—
yena vijñāyate bhrātā bhaginī ca na saṃśayaḥ || 1 ||

lg.l: aṅgulīṃ darśayed yas tu āgatam ity uktaṃ bhavet |
anāmikāṃ tu yo dadyād dadyāt tasya kaniṣṭhikām |
madhyamāṃ darśayed yas tu dadyāt tasya pradeśikām || 3 ||
anāmikāṃ darśayed yas tu grīvāṃ tasya pradarśayet |
paṭaṃ saṃdarśayed yas tu triśūlaṃ tasya darśayet || 4 ||
stanaṃ darśayed yas tu sīmān tasya pradarśayet |
medinīṃ darśayed yas tu cakraṃ tasya pradarśayet || 5 ||
bhṛkuṭīṃ darśayed yas tu śikhāmokṣo vidhīyate |
lalāṭaṃ darśayed yas tu pṛṣṭaṃ tasya pradarśayet || 6 ||
pādatalaṃ darśayed yas tu krīḍate kautukena tu |
vadanti tatra yoginya aho putra mahākṛpa |

yadi mālāhastaṃ darśayanti tatra militavyam iti
kathayanti || 8 ||
mālām abhipreṣitāṃ kṛtvā samaye tiṣṭha suvratā |
yad dhi vadanti yoginyas tat sarvam eva karttavyam || 9 ||

div.p:
vajragarbha uvāca—he bhagavan ! ke te melāpakasthānāḥ |
bhagavān āha—
te pīṭhaṃ copapīṭhaṃ ca kṣetropakṣetram eva ca |
chandohaṃ copacchandohaṃ melāpakopamelāpakas tathā |

lg.l: daśabhūmīśvaro nātha ebhir anyair na kathyate || 11 ||

div.p:
vajragarbha uvāca—he bhagavan ! ke te pīṭhādayaḥ |
bhagavān āha—
pīṭhaṃ jālandharaṃ khyātam oḍḍiyānaṃ tathaiva ca |
pīṭhaṃ paurṇagiriś caiva kāmarūpaṃ tathaiva ca || 12 ||

lg.l: upapīṭhaṃ mālavaṃ proktaṃ sindhur nagaram eva ca |
upakṣetraṃ kulatā proktam arbudaś ca tathaiva ca |
godāvarī himādriś ca upakṣetraṃ hi saṃkṣipet || 14 ||
lampākaṃ kāñcikaṃ caiva saurāṣṭraṃ ca tathaiva ca || 15 ||
pīlavaṃ ca grāmāntasthaṃ pīlavaṃ nagarasya ca |

div.p:
vajragarbha uvāca—he bhagavan, ke te divasāḥ |
bhagavān āha—
pretapakṣe caturdaśyām aṣṭamyāñ ca tathaiva ca || 20 ||

lg.l: dhvajaṃ śastrahataṃ caiva saptāvartaṃ ca bhakṣayet |
kṛpām utpādya yatnena māraṇaṃ kriyate viduḥ || 21 ||
kṛpāhīnā na sidhyanti tasmāt kṛpām utpādayet |

div.p:
tatraivaṃ mantavyam |
dinas tu bhagavān vajrī naktaṃ prajñā ca bhaṇyate || 23 ||

lg.l: nākāryaṃ vidyate kiñcin nābhakṣyaṃ vidyate sadā |
nācintyaṃ vidyate hy atra nāvācyaṃ yac chubhāśubham || 24 ||
yathātmani tathā sattve tathātmani ahaṃ param |
yāvanto hy aṅgavikṣepā vacasaḥ prasarāṇi ca |
yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ ca jantūnāṃ piśitam aśnīyate budhaiḥ |
te te sattvā vaśaṃ yānti vajrakapālayogataḥ || 28 ||

div.p: chomāpaṭalaḥ saptamaḥ ||

atha yoginīcakraṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ—
khadhātau bhagaṃ dhyātvā madhye kurvīta bhāvanām |
cakraṃ pūrvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ devatānāṃ yathodayam || 1 ||

lg.l: cakraṃ kṣoṇī jalaṃ pūrvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ hutāśanam |
paścān mārtaṇḍam ākrāntam dvayor melā mahat sukham |
ākārān bhāvayet pañca vidhānaiḥ kathitair budhaḥ |
gauryādyāś ca bhavanty asmād varṇabhedaṃ paraṃ pṛthak || 11 ||
indre vajrā yame gaurī vāruṇyāṃ vāriyoginī |

bāhyapuṭe punaḥ
gaurī caurī vetālī ca ghasmarī pukkasī tathā |
śavarī caṇḍālī caiva aṣṭamī ḍombinī matā || 14 ||
adhovaty ūrdhvavaty eva khecarī bhūcarī smṛtā |
tathā mānādi ṣaḍdoṣān kartituṃ kartrikā sthitā |
etena bhāvayec cakraṃ laghu siddhim avāpnuyāt |
prathame bhāvayet kṛṣṇāṃ dvitīye raktam eva ca || 22 ||
tṛtīye bhāvayet pītāṃ caturthe haritāṃ tathā |
ṣaḍaṅgaṃ bhāvayed yogī viramāntaṃ punas tathā |
kramam utpattikaṃ caiva utpannakramam eva ca || 24 ||
khadhātāv iti padmeṣu jñānaṃ bhagam iti smṛtam |
yathodayaṃ bhavec chukraṃ dvaividyaṃ sahajaṃ tataḥ || 27 ||
yoṣit tāvad bhavet prajñā upāyaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ |
puṃsi tāvad dhi dvaividhyaṃ śukraṃ tasya sukhañ ca vā |
prajñāyāṃ ca yathā puṃsi śukraṃ tasya sukhañ ca vā || 29 ||
paramānandaṃ bhavaṃ proktaṃ nirvāṇaṃ ca virāgataḥ |
na rāgo na virāgaś ca madhyamaṃ nopalabhyate |
nānyena kathyate sahajaṃ na kasminn api labhyate |
hīnaṃ sūkṣmapadārthaṃ tu utkṛṣṭaṃ bhāvam ucyate |
madhyamaṃ varjitaṃ dvābhyām anyānīti ṣaḍ indriyam || 38 ||
sthiracalaṃ yāni tāni sarvāṇy etānīty evāham |
samaṃ tulyam iti proktaṃ tasya cakro rasaḥ smṛtaḥ |
madbhavaṃ hi jagat sarvaṃ madbhavaṃ bhuvanatrayam |
madvyāpitam idaṃ sarvaṃ nānyamayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ jagat || 41 ||
evaṃ matvā tu vai yogī yo 'bhyāse susamāhitaḥ |
sa sidhyati na sandeho mandapuṇyo 'pi mānavaḥ || 42 ||
khānapāne yathā snāne jāgrat supto 'pi cintayet |
bhāvyate hi jagat sarvaṃ manasā yasmān na bhāvyate |
teṣām ekaṃ paraṃ nāsti svasaṃvedyaṃ mahat sukham |
svasaṃvedyā bhavet siddhiḥ svasaṃvedyā hi bhāvanā || 46 ||
svayaṃ hartā svayaṃ kartā svayaṃ rājā svayaṃ prabhuḥ || 47 ||
rāgo dveṣas tathaiverṣyā moho mānas tathaiva ca |
sarve te tatpade ramye kalāṃ nārghanti ṣoḍaśīm || 48 ||
śukrākāro bhaved bhagavān tatsukhaṃ kāminī smṛtam |
pṛthivy āpaś ca vāyuś ca teja ākāśam eva ca |
svargamartyaiś ca pātālair ekamūrtir bhavet kṣaṇāt |
siddhir na syād bhavec chuddhyā punarjanma bhavāntare || 54 ||
na ca tena vinā siddhir iha loke paratra ca |
na jñātaṃ yena hevajraṃ vyarthas tasya pariśramaḥ || 55 ||

div.p: yoginīcakro nāma mahāyoginīnāṃ melāpakapaṭalo 'ṣṭamaḥ ||

ataḥ paraṃ viśuddhipaṭalaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ—
sarveṣāṃ khalu vastūnāṃ viśuddhis tathatā smṛtā |
paścād ekaikabhedena devatānāṃ tu kathyate || 1 ||

lg.l: rūpaviṣayādi ye 'py anye pratibhāsante hi yoginaḥ |
sarve te śuddhabhāvā hi yasmād buddhamayaṃ jagat || 4 ||

div.p:
he bhagavan ke te 'viśuddhāḥ ? bhagavān āha—
rūpādayaḥ | kasmāt ? grāhyagrāhakabhāvāt |
vajragarbha āha—ke te grāhyagrāhakāś ceti || 5 ||

bhagavān āha |
cakṣuṣā gṛhyate rūpaṃ śabdaḥ karṇena śrūyate |
gandhaṃ nāsikayā vetti jihvayā svādanaṃ viduḥ || 6 ||

lg.l: kāyena spṛśyate vastu manaḥ sukhādim āpnute |
rūpaskandhe bhaved vajrā gaurī vedanāyāṃ smṛtā |

div.p:
vijñānaskandharūpeṇa sthitā nairātmyayoginī |
sadā tāsāṃ viśuddhyā vai sidhyanti tattvayoginaḥ
adhyātmapuṭam || 9 ||

paścād bāhyapuṭaṃ vakṣye aparagauryādiyoginyaḥ |
aiśānyāṃ pukkasī khyātā agnau śavarī kīrtitā |
nairṛtye sthāpya caṇḍālīṃ vāyave ḍombinī sthitā || 10 ||

lg.l: indre gaurī yame caurī vetālī vāruṇe diśi |
kauvere ghasmarī caiva adhastād bhūcarī smṛtā || 11 ||
rūpe gaurī samākhyātā śabde caurī prakīrtitā |
vetālī gandhabhāge ca rase ghasmarī kīrtitā || 13 ||
sparśe ca bhūcarī khyātā khecarī dharmadhātutaḥ |
sadā hy āsāṃ viśuddhyā tu sidhyanti tattvayoginaḥ || 14 ||
pṛthivī pukkasī khyātā abdhātuḥ śavarī smṛtā |
tejaś caṇḍālinī jñeyā vāyur ḍombī prakīrtitā || 16 ||
moho vajrā tathākhyātā dveṣādīnāṃ tu śodhanam |
tena tu tena tu bandhanaṃ muñcet |

tasmāt
gandha na śabda na rūpaṃ

div.p: viśuddhipaṭalo navamaḥ ||

lg.l: athavā yā kā yathālabdhā ṣoḍaśābdā tathaiva ca |
tāvad dhi sevyate mudrā yāvac chukravatī bhavet || 6 ||
mudrāyāś ca mukhaṃ baddhvā upāyasya mukhaṃ tathā |
sevayā tatra yad bhūtaṃ śiṣyavaktre nipātayet || 7 ||
sa eva prāṇināṃ prāṇaḥ sa eva paramākṣaraḥ |
sa evāsau mahāprāṇaḥ sa evāsau jaganmayaḥ |
bhāvābhāvau tadudbhūtau anyāni yāni tāni ca || 11 ||
sarvaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ ca puruṣaḥ purāṇa īśvaraḥ |
ātmā jīvaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca kālaḥ pudgala eva ca |
tṛtīyaṃ viramākhyaṃ ca caturthaṃ sahajaṃ sṛtam || 13 ||
evaṃ śrutvā tu vai sarve vajragarbhādayo budhāḥ |
viramānandaṃ jagac caiva na vidyate sahajaṃ triṣu || 15 || iti ||
na rāgo na virāgaś ca madhyamaṃ nopalabhyate |
trayāṇāṃ varjanād eva sahajaṃ bodhir ucyate || 17 ||
prathamaṃ meghavad bhāti siddhe tu māyāvad bhavet |
ity āha maṇḍalaṃ śāstā catuṣkoṇaṃ samujjvalam || 20 ||
dhūpaṃ dīpaṃ tathā gandham aṣṭakalaśādibhir yutam || 22 ||
baliṃ ca dāpayet tatra prāg akārādimantrataḥ |
rakṣāṃ caiva yathādiṣṭāṃ yathā dhyāne tathātra ca || 26 ||
prakāśitās tu ye sekā vidhivad dadyāt svamaṇḍale |
pūjā cābhyarcanā caiva yathākhyātā tathātra ca || 27 ||
śuddhaṃ dvipuṭam ālikhya cakraṃ gauryādīnāṃ tatha |
pūrveṇa likhet kartrikāṃ dakṣiṇe paścime tathā || 28 ||
uttare cāgnikoṇe ca nairṛtye vāyave tathā |
aiśāne ca yathākhyātam adhaś cordhvaṃ tathā tathā || 29 ||
paramaratau na ca bhāva na bhāvaka |
na ca vigraha na ca grāhya na grāhaka |
māṃsa na śoṇita viṣṭa na mūtra |
na charda na moha na śaucapavitram || 33 ||
rāga na dveṣa na moha na īrṣyā |
na ca paiśunya na ca māna na dṛśyam |
bhāva na bhāvaka mitra na śatru |
ity āha vajragarbhākhyaḥ kasmād bhūtātmakaṃ bhavet |

div.p: vajragarbha āha—he bhagavan, kasmān mahābhautikaskandhaḥ || 37 ||

lg.l: gharṣaṇād jāyate tejo gamanād vāyuḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 39 ||
tasmāt saukhyaṃ na tattvākhyaṃ mahābhūtaṃ yataḥ sukham || 40 ||
sahajātyāṃ yad utpannaṃ sahajaṃ tat prakīrtitam |
na mantrajāpo na tapo na homo
na maṇḍaleyaṃ na ca maṇdalaṃ ca |
sa mantrajāpaḥ sa tapaḥ sa homas

div.p: abhiṣekapaṭalo daśamaḥ ||

lg.l: samākrūrā lalāṭī ca pātanā kathitā sadā |
vaśyā vāmāśritā dṛṣṭiḥ puttalī dvau ca vāmataḥ || 1 ||
ākṛṣṭir dakṣiṇe bhāge puttalī dvau hi cordhvataḥ |
madhyamā stambhanā dṛṣṭir dvau ca nāsājaḍāntare || 2 ||
bhrāntir atra na kartavyā acintyā hi buddharddhayaḥ || 5 ||
māraṇaṃ nātra kāryaṃ syāt samayabhedaḥ paraṃ bhavet || 6 ||
sarvākāryaṃ tu kartavyaṃ hitvā sattvasya vañcanām |
nādiṃ gādiṃ tathā hādim antaśvam ādiśvaṃ ca vā || 8 ||
saptāvartaṃ tato lakṣet hevajroktais tu lakṣaṇaiḥ || 9 ||
saptacchāyā bhavet tasya dṛṣṭvā yogī tu lakṣayet |
atha kurukullāyāḥ sādhanaṃ vakṣye, yena sarvasattvāni vaśaṃ yānti |

div.p: śrīhevajraḍākinījālasaṃvare vajragarbhābhisaṃbodhir nāma prathamaḥ kalparājaḥ samāptaḥ ||

atha vajragarbha āha—
deśayantu yathānyāyaṃ pratiṣṭhālakṣaṇaṃ śubham |
bhagavān vajrasārātmā sarvabuddhaikasaṃgrahaḥ || 1 ||

bhagavān āha—
homaṃ kṛtvā yathāproktaṃ vartayitvā tu maṇḍalam |
pradoṣe saṃskaret pratimāṃ kṛtvādhivāsanādikam || 2 ||

lg.l: śāntike vartulaṃ kuṇḍaṃ caturasraṃ tu pauṣṭike |
trikoṇaṃ māraṇe proktaṃ śeṣān atraiva sādhayet || 6 ||
dvihastam ekahastaṃ ca adhordhve pauṣṭikaṃ matam || 7 ||
viṃśatyaṅgulam ardhaṃ ca adhordhve māraṇaṃ bhavet |
śukravarṇaṃ bhavec chāntau pītaṃ tu pauṣṭike tathā || 8 ||
māraṇe kṛṣṇavarṇañ ca vaśye raktaṃ prakīrtitam |
yathā vaśye tathā kṛṣṭau dveṣādau yathā māraṇe || 9 ||
tilaṃ śāntau dadhi puṣṭau māraṇe kaṇṭhakaṃ tathā |

div.p:
oṃ agnaye mahātejaḥ sarvakāmaprasādhaka |
kāruṇyakṛtasattvārtha asmin sannihito bhava ||
agnyāvāhanamantraḥ || 11 ||
div.lg:
svārthañ caiva parārthañ ca sādhituṃ gaccha havyabhuk |
āgamiṣyasi yathākāle sarvasiddhiṃ kuruṣva me ||
agnisantoṣaṇamantraḥ || 13 ||

lg.l: oṃ jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hāḥ khaṃ raṃ arghamantraḥ |
oṃ nī rī hūṃ khaḥ pādyamantraḥ |

div.p: homanirṇayapratiṣṭhāpaṭalaḥ prathamaḥ ||

lg.l: kṣaṇam apy anyacittaḥ san na tiṣṭhet siddhikāṅkṣakaḥ || 2 ||
aṅghriṃ prakṣālayan bhuñjan ācaman pūgaṃ bhakṣayan |
candanair hastaṃ mardayan kaupinaiś chādayan kaṭim || 5 ||
niḥsaran bhāṣayan bhāṣāṃ gacchan tiṣṭhan ruṣan hasan |
bhagavatīṃ sevayet prājño yoginīṃ bhāvayed vratī || 6 ||
na sthātavyaṃ budhair yatnāt siddhyarthaṃ siddhikāṃkṣibhiḥ || 7 ||
kathaṃ te kṣaṇam apy ekaṃ yoginaḥ santi raurave || 12 ||
api tu ye janmahīnā ye mūrkhāḥ krūrakarmiṇaḥ || 13 ||
kurūpā vikalagātrāś ca siddhyante te 'pi cintayā |
māsam ekaṃ cared guptaṃ yāvat mudrā na labhyate |
gṛhītvā amukīṃ mudrāṃ sattvārthaṃ kuru vajradhṛk |
māsam ekena bhāvyā sā bhaven naivātra saṃśayaḥ || 19 ||
athavā cātmanaḥ śaktyā kṛṣṭvā mudrāṃ prakalpayet || 20 ||
tāṃ ca gṛhya carec caryām ātmano dhairyapratyayāt || 21 ||
na caryā bhogataḥ proktā yā khyātā bhīmarūpiṇī |
svacittapratyavekṣāya sthiraṃ kiṃ vā calaṃ manaḥ |
mudrayā mudrayā dvābhyāṃ mudrāsiddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet || 23 ||
tīradvayaṃ bhaved ghaṇṭā kiñjalkaṃ bolakaṃ bhavet |
upāyaḥ saṃbhavo yasmāl layaṃ prajñā bhavāntakī || 27 ||
tena pralayan nāsyāsti utpādo naiva tattvataḥ |
pralayāl līyate kaścil layābhāvān na ca kṣayaḥ || 28 ||
yathā māyā yathā svapnaṃ yathā syād antarābhavam |
sukhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ sukhaṃ pītaṃ sukhaṃ raktaṃ sukhaṃ sitam |
sukhaṃ śyāmaṃ sukhaṃ nīlaṃ sukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ carācaram || 32 ||
sukhaṃ prajñā sukhopāyaḥ sukhaṃ kundurujaṃ tathā |
dehābhāve kutaḥ saukhyaṃ saukhyaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate |
yathā puṣpāśritaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpābhāvān na gamyate |
māṃ na jānanti ye mūḍhāḥ kausīdyopahatāś ca ye || 37 ||
vyākhyātāham ahaṃ dharmaḥ śrotāhaṃ sugaṇair yutaḥ |
sādhyo 'haṃ jagataḥ śāstā loko 'haṃ laukiko 'py aham || 39 ||
tathā ca pratyayaṃ putra andhakāre pradīpavat || 40 ||
vinā tena na saukhyaṃ syāt sukhaṃ hitvā bhaven na saḥ |
tasmād buddho na bhāvaḥ syād abhāvarūpo 'pi naiva saḥ |
tasmāt sahajaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sahajaṃ svarūpam ucyate |
karṇe toyaṃ yathā viṣṭaṃ pratitoyena kṛṣyate |
yathā pāvakadagdhāś ca svidyante vahninā punaḥ |
yena yena hi badhyante jantavo raudrakarmaṇā |
viparītabhāvanā hy eṣā na jñātā buddhatīrthikaiḥ || 51 ||
eka eva mahānandaḥ pañcatāṃ yānti bhedanaiḥ || 52 ||
bodhicittaṃ dravaṃ yasmād dravam abdhātukaṃ matam |
apām akṣobhyarūpatvād dveṣo hy akṣobhya nāyakaḥ || 54 ||
dvayor gharṣaṇasaṃyogāt tejo hi jāyate sadā |
īrṣyā hy amoghasiddhiḥ syād amogho vāyusaṃbhavaḥ || 56 ||
sukhaṃ rāgaṃ bhaved raktaṃ raktir ākāśalakṣaṇam |
ekam eva mahac cittaṃ pañcarūpeṇa saṃsthitam |

div.p: hevajre ḍākinījālasaṃvare siddhinirṇayo nāma dvitīyaḥ paṭalaḥ ||

lg.l: atha vajrī sarvatantranidānaṃ nāmopāyaṃ yoginīnāṃ kathayām āsa—
saṃvaraṃ cābhiṣekaṃ ca sandhyābhāṣāṃ tathaiva ca |
abhiṣekāj jñāyate samyag evaṃkāraṃ mahat sukham || 2 ||
atha bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvaṃ yoginya evam āhuḥ—
evaṃkāraṃ kim ucyate ḍākinīnān tu saṃvaram |
*vicitraṃ ca vipākaṃ ca vimardo vilakṣaṇaṃ tathā |
vimardam ālocanaṃ proktaṃ sukhaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti ca |
ācārya guhya prajñā ca caturthan tat punas tathā |
hasitaśuddhyā tv ācārya īkṣaṇe guhyakas tathā |
prajñā hi pāṇyāvāptau ca tat punar dvandvatantrake || 11 ||
pāṇibhyāṃ tu samāliṅgya prajñāṃ vai ṣoḍaśābdikām |
śāstā brūyāt mahāsattva gṛhṇa mudrāṃ sukhāvahām |
śāstā tam ājñāpayati kunduruṃ kuru vajradhṛk |
mudrāyuktaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā stutipūjāṃ kared yathā |
yathā yūyaṃ mahātmāno mamāpi kuru tad vibho || 19 ||
śāstā brūyāt mahāsattva dhāraṇīyaṃ mahat sukham || 22 ||
yāvad ā bodhiparyantaṃ sattvārthaṃ kuru vajradhṛk |
ity evaṃ vadate vajrī śiṣyaṃ dīkṣākriyācayam || 23 ||
sthiracalaṃ vyāpya saṃtiṣṭhet māyārūpi ca bhāti ca |

p.l: atha sarvayoginīnāṃ bhaginīnāṃ mṛṣitvā vajragarbho bhagavantam evam āha—

lg.l: maṇḍalaṃ sāram ity uktaṃ bodhicittaṃ mahat sukham |
ādānaṃ tat karotīti maṇḍalaṃ malanaṃ matam || 27 ||
prāṇinaś ca tvayā ghātyā vaktavyaṃ ca mṛṣāvacaḥ |
adattaṃ ca tvayā grāhyaṃ sevanaṃ parayoṣitaḥ || 29 ||
ke punas te viṣayāḥ kānīndriyāṇi kim āyatanaṃ | katame skandhāḥ | ke punas te dhātavaḥ | eṣāṃ kiṃ svabhāvam || 31 ||
rūpa śabdas tathā gandho rasa sparśas tathaiva ca |
dharmadhātusvabhāvaś ca ṣaḍ ete viṣayā matāḥ || 32 ||
cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ca ghrāṇaṃ ca jihvā kāyo manas tathā |
indriyaṃ viṣayaṃ caiva indriyavijñānam eva ca |
*svabhāvam ādyanutpannaṃ na satyaṃ na mṛṣā tathā |

div.p: tad yathā kāṇḍaṃ ca mathanīyaṃ ca puruṣahastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītyākasmād agnir upajāyate | asāv agnir na kāṇḍe tiṣṭhati | na mathanīye na puruṣahastavyāyāme | sarvākārataḥ parigaveṣyamānaḥ, ekasminn api nāsti | sa cāgnir na satyaṃ na mṛṣā || evaṃ sarvadharmān yoginyo manasikuruta || 37 ||
atha nairātmyayoginīpramukhāḥ sarvavajraḍākinyaḥ pañcāmṛtaṃ gṛhītvā samayadravyaṃ ca bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvaṃ pūjayanti | kunduruyogenānurāgayanti | pibayanti ca vajrāmṛtarasam || 38 ||

lg.l: tataḥ paścād bhagavāṃs tuṣṭe sati adhiṣṭhānaṃ darśayati |
mayā guptīkṛtaṃ tattvaṃ sarvair buddhair namaskṛtam |

div.p: atha utsāhaprāptāḥ sarvā devyo dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ śṛṇvanti || 40 ||

lg.l: khānaṃ pānaṃ yathāprāptaṃ gamyāgamyaṃ na varjayet |
snānaṃ śaucaṃ na kurvīta grāmyadharmaṃ na varjayet || 41 ||
mantraṃ naiva japed dhīmān dhyānaṃ naivāvalambayet |
mitrasnehaṃ na kurvīta dviṣṭe dveṣaṃ tathā na ca |
pañcāmṛtaṃ guḍaṃ madyaṃ viṣaṃ nimbaṃ prasūtajam |
kaupīnaṃ viśvavarṇaṃ ca mṛcchārair bhūṣaṇaṃ tathā |
puṣpaṃ pretālaye prāpya bandhayen mūrddhajaṃ varam || 49 ||
ghrāṇe mātsaryakī khyātā vaktre ca rāgavajrikā || 51 ||
sandhyābhāṣaṃ kim ucyeta bhagavān bobrūta niścitam |
hasitaṃ cekṣaṇābhyāṃ tu āliṅgaṃ dvandvakais tathā |
tantreṇāpi caturṇāṃ ca saṃdhyābhāṣaṃ na śabditam || 54 ||
vakṣyāmy ahaṃ vajragarbha śṛṇu tvam ekacetasā |
madanaṃ madyaṃ balaṃ māṃsaṃ malayajaṃ milanaṃ matam |
āgatiḥ preṅkhaṇaṃ proktaṃ kṛpīṭaṃ ḍamarukaṃ matam |
abhavyaṃ dunduraṃ khyātaṃ bhavyaṃ kāliñjaraṃ matam || 57 ||
gūthaṃ catuḥsamaṃ proktaṃ mūtraṃ kastūrikā smṛtā |
svayaṃbhū sihlakaṃ jñeyaṃ śukraṃ karpūrakaṃ matam || 59 ||
vajraṃ bolakaṃ khyātaṃ padmaṃ kakkolakaṃ matam || 60 ||
sandhyābhāṣata evaṃ syur buddhāś ca pañcakaulikāḥ || 61 ||
ḍombī vajrakulī khyātā naṭī padmakulī tathā |
caṇḍālī ratnakulī caiva dvijā tāthāgatī matā || 62 ||
rajakī karmakulī caiva etā mudrāḥ susiddhidāḥ |
āsāṃ śukraṃ bhaved vajraṃ pūjayitvā pibed vratī || 63 ||
vajragarbha mahāsattva yan mayā kathitaṃ tvayi |
tat sarvaṃ sādaraṃ grāhyaṃ sandhyābhāṣaṃ mahādbhutam || 64 ||
mṛyate 'sau yadi buddho 'pi sandhyābhāṣān na bhāṣayet || 66 ||
svasamayavidāṃ prāpya yadi na bhāṣed idaṃ vacaḥ |

div.p: hevajrasarvatantranidhānasandhyābhāṣo nāma tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ ||

p.l: atha vajragarbhapramukhāḥ sarvaḍākinyaḥ saṃśayaprāptā daurmanasyaprāptā bhagavantaṃ vajrasattvam evam āhuḥ |

lg.l: caryāpaṭale yad ākhyātaṃ gītaṃ nāṭyaṃ ca siddhidam |
tatra saṃdeho me vartate kiṃ gītaṃ nāṭyaṃ ca kim || 2 ||
tatra saṃdeho me vartate kiṃ mudryaṃ kasya mudraṇam || 3 ||
mantrapaṭale yat proktaṃ nairātmyādeś ca bījakam |
tatra me bhrāntiḥ saṃjātā kiṃ bījaṃ kasya bījakam || 4 ||
viśuddhiṃ tāsāṃ kathayantu bhagavanto bhrāntir me 'bhūt || 5 ||
ghaṇa kiviḍa ho vājjaï karuṇe kiaï na rolā || 6 ||
tahi baru khājjaï gāḍhe maanā pijjaï |
hale kāliñjara paṇiaï dunduru tahi vajjiaï |
causama kacchuri sihlā kappura lāi aï |
māla indhana śāliñja tahi bharu khāiaï || 7 ||
preṅkhaṇa kheṭa karante śuddhāśuddha na muṇiaï |
niraṃsua aṅga caḍābī tahiṃ ja sarāba paṇiaï |
malayaje kunduru bāṭaï ḍiṇḍima tahiṇṇa vajjiaï || 8 ||
vajradharmais tathā buddhair yoginībhiś ca mātṛbhiḥ |
anenaiva vaśaṃ loke mantrajāpaṃ tv anena tu || 11 ||
sādaraṃ gīyate yatra sādaraṃ yatra nṛtyate |
gaṇādhyakṣaṃ puraskṛtyaṃ tatra ghrāṇaṃ tu lakṣayet || 12 ||
laśunaṃ prathamaṃ gandhaṃ gṛdhragandhaṃ tataḥ punaḥ |
gomāyor api śabdaṃ ca bāhyodyāne tu lakṣayet || 14 ||
mudraṇaṃ liṅgaṇāṅkaṃ ca aṅkena lakṣate kulam |
vyastakulaṃ bhāvanāyogān na siddhir nāpi sādhakaḥ || 15 ||
pañcamaṃ vajraḍākī ca ṣaṣṭamaṃ pukkasī matā|
śavarī saptamaṃ caiva caṇḍālī aṣṭamaṃ smṛtā|| 21||
caurī ekādaśaṃ khyātaṃ vetālī dvādaśaṃ matam|| 22||
sarvaśeṣāṃ tyajed yatnāt ṣoḍaśī na kalā yataḥ|| 25||
karpūraṃ kiṃ na vai tyājyaṃ sarvayoginīsaṃbhavam|
bhagavān āha|| evam etad yathā vadasi||
evam eva tu saṃsāraṃ nirvāṇam evam eva tu|
saṃsārād ṛte nānyan nirvāṇam iti kathyate|| 32||
amī dharmās tu nirvāṇaṃ mohāt saṃsārarūpiṇaḥ|
madanaṃ pāyayet tasyāṃ svayaṃ caiva pibet tataḥ|
kakkole bolakaṃ kṣiptvā kunduruṃ kurute vratī|
tasmin yoge samudbhūtaṃ karpūraṃ na tyajed budhaḥ|| 38||
na kareṇa tato gṛhyet śuktikayā na śaṅkhakaiḥ|
amṛtaṃ jihvayā grāhyam edhanāya balasya vai|| 39||
na sā dīrghā na sā hrasvā na caturasrā na vartulā |
tasyām utpadyate yogī tasyāḥ saukhyaṃ bhunakti ca |
tayā sārdhaṃ bhavet siddhir mahāmudrā sukhaṃdadā || 43 ||
rūpaṃ śabdas tathā gandho rasaḥ sparśas tathaiva ca |
bhagavatā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃvaraṃ kathayasva me || 48 ||
yathā bāhyaṃ tathādhyātmaṃ saṃvaraṃ tat prakāśitam || 49 ||
tatra nirmāṇakāyaḥ syān nirmāṇaṃ sthāvaraṃ matam || 53 ||
dharmaś cittasvarūpaṃ tu dharmakāyo hṛdi bhavet || 54 ||
saṃbhogaṃ bhuñjanaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ vai rasarūpiṇam |
kaṇṭhe saṃbhogacakraṃ ca mahāsukhaṃ śirasi sthitam || 55 ||
yathā kṛtaṃ tathā bhuktaṃ niṣyanda iti śabditam |
vipākaṃ tadviparyāsaṃ karmaṇy alpe mahat phalam |
sthāvarī nirmāṇacakre tu nirmāṇaṃ sthāvaraṃ yataḥ |
saṃvidī sambhogacakre ca kaṇṭhe saṃvedanaṃ yataḥ |
mahāsaṅghī mahāsukhacakre ca mahāsukhaṃ ke sthitaṃ yataḥ || 60 ||
nikāyaṃ kāyam ity uktam udaraṃ vihāram ucyate |
jāto bhikṣur dhvanan mantro nagnaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍitaḥ || 63 ||
ābhiḥ sāmagrībhiḥ sattvā buddhā eva na saṃśayaḥ |

div.p: atha sarvā devyo nairātmyayoginīpramukhāḥ | tadyathā locanā māmakī ca pāṇḍurā ca tārā ca bhṛkuṭī ca cundā ca parṇaśavarī ca ahomukhā ca | evaṃ pramukhāḥ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamā yoginyaḥ paramavismayam āpannāḥ || 65 || etāṃ bhāratīṃ śrutvā mūrcchitāḥ saṃtrastā avanau patitāḥ | dhūnaprāptāḥ tāḥ sarvadevīr dṛṣṭvā saṃstauti vajrī punar utthāpanāya ca || 66 ||

lg.l: khiti jala pavaṇa hūtāsānaha tumhe bhāīṇi devī |
sunaha pavañcami tatum ahu jo ṇa jānaī ko vi || 67 ||
svapnavad bhagavato vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvās tā jīvaprāptā abhūvan || 68 ||
sattvā buddhā eva kiṃ tu āgantukamalāvṛtāḥ |
tasyāpakarṣaṇāt sattvā buddhā eva na saṃśayaḥ || 69 ||
evam etad bhagavan, satyaṃ na mṛṣā || 70 ||
ghasmaï garalaha bhakkhāṇahi jo nicceḍya ṇa loa |
mohavaïvarjitā tatumaṇa tattva para tuṭua soa || 71 ||
avidyādyair na gṛhyante na ca mohādibandanaiḥ || 72 ||
abuddho nāsti sattvaikaḥ saṃbodhāt svasya svasya ca |
na jānanti yataḥ saukhyaṃ devasyāpy asurasya ca || 74 ||
cittam eva hi saṃbuddho na buddho 'nyatra darśitaḥ || 75 ||
te 'pi hevajram āgamya sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ || 76 ||
saṃsaranti ca te mūḍhāḥ ṣaḍgatau bhavacārake || 77 ||
viśodhayanti viṣayān lapsyante te hy anuttaram || 78 ||
mohaṃ yasmāt kakkhāṭatvaṃ kāyo vairocano mataḥ |
kāyaṃ vihāya cittasya nānyatra lalitaṃ bhavet |
tasmād vairocanaś cittaṃ kāyaṃ cittena mudrayet || 80 ||
cittaṃ vihāya kāyasya sthitir anyā na dṛśyate |
tasmāc cittaṃ bhavet mohaṃ cittaṃ mohena mudrayet || 82 ||
tejaś caṇḍālinī khyātā kathaṃ ratnena mudraṇam |
rāgo raktaṃ yataḥ khyātaṃ raktaṃ ca ratnasambhavaḥ |
rāgaṃ hitvā īrṣyāyā na syād anyatra saṃbhavaḥ |
tasmād rāgasya mudreṇa ḍombinīṃ mudrayed budhaḥ || 86 ||
rūpaṃ yasmāt kakkhāṭatvaṃ gauryā vairocano mataḥ |
caurīṃ tenaiva nyāyena vetālīñ ca tathaiva ca |
ghasmarīṃ ca tayā yuktyā mudraṇam aviparītataḥ || 88 ||
inda jama jala jakkha bhuta vahni vāyu rakkha |
canda sujja māda bappa talapātāle aṭṭhasappa svāhā || 91 ||
ambha kajja savva sādha khanti kuṇi pheḍa gāda || 92 ||

div.p: oṃ akāro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām ādyanutpannatvāt | oṃ āḥ hūṁ phaṭ svāhā || 93 ||

lg.l: anena balinā yadi sarvabhūtān pūjāṃ prakurvanti śubhāya yoginaḥ |
bhavet tadā teṣu sukham anāvilaṃ devāś ca tuṣyanti jagatsubhūtayaḥ || 94 ||
śāntisukhaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ bhavec ca dadyāt baliṃ yadīha bhūtagaṇāya śāśvataḥ || 95 ||
khecarī kena mudreṇa bhūcarī kasya mudrataḥ |
karttavyaṃ mudraṇaṃ kathaṃ prāg na jñātaṃ mayā prabho || 96 ||
cittaṃ madhyamakaṃ sthānaṃ nairātmyā tena madhyajā || 99 ||
trividhaṃ pañcavidhaṃ caiva kathyate śṛṇu yoginī || 100 ||

div.p: akṣobhya-vairocana-ratnasambhava-amitaprabha-amoghasiddhi-vajrasattvaḥ | dveṣa-moha-piśuna-rāga-īrṣyā-saukhyam | śuddhyānayānukramato hi bhāvyāḥ || 101 ||

lg.l: dveṣavajra prabhāvo 'yaṃ kulaṃ ṣaṭ pañcakaṃ matam || 103 ||

div.p: hevajrasarvatantramudraṇapiṇḍārtho nāma caturthaḥ paṭalaḥ ||

lg.l: tvadīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kīdṛk prāg na jñātaṃ mayā prabho || 4 ||
cumbayitvā tu nairātmyāṃ kṣiptvā vajraṃ kapālake |
tatra madhye 'haṃ vidyate tvayā sārdhaṃ varānane |
tvayā mayā pure ramye krīḍatā ratinirbharaiḥ |
niḥsṛtya dakṣiṇe dvāre caurī sā dvārapālikā || 14 ||
uṭṭha bharāḍo karuṇamaṇḍa pukkasī mahuṃ paritāhiṃ |
mahāsua joe kāma mahuṃ chaḍḍahiṃ suṇṇasamāhi || 20 ||
tohyā vihuṇṇe marami hahuṃ uṭṭhehiṃ tuhuṃ hevajja |
loa nimantia suraapahu suṇṇe acchasi kīsa |
hauṃ caṇḍāli viṇṇanami taï viṇṇa ḍahami na dīsa || 22 ||
indī ālī uṭṭha tuhuṃ hauṃ jānāmi ttuha cittaḥ |
ambhe ḍombī cheamaṇḍa mā kara karuṇavicchittaḥ || 23 ||
pṛthivī varuṇa vāyuś ca tejaś candrārka eva ca |
aṃ hūṃ bhyāṃ ca mahāvajrī utthito dravamūrtitaḥ |
caraṇān sphārayan bhūmau tarjayañ ca surāsurān || 27 ||
gaṁ caṁ vaṁ ghaṁ paṁ śaṁ laṁ ḍaṁ bījais tu sṛjed āsām |
mātṛ cakre pure ramye bhāvayed īdṛśaṃ prabhum |
gauryā hi dakṣiṇe kartry avasavye rohitas tathā |
kṛpīṭaṃ dakṣiṇe cauryā vāme pāṇau varāhakam || 30 ||
pukkasyā dakṣiṇe siṃhaṃ vāme paraśus tathā |
śavaryā dakṣiṇe bhikṣur vāme khiṅkhirikā tathā || 32 ||
caṇḍālyā dakṣiṇe cakraṃ vāmena lāṅgalaṃ tathā |
ḍombyā dakṣiṇe vajraṃ vāme savyatarjanī tathā || 33 ||
caṇḍālī ca nabhaḥśyāmā ḍombī karcūrā matā || 36 ||
nairṛtir vemacitrī ca gauryādīnāṃ tu viṣṭaram || 37 ||
bolakaṃ bhūṣayitvā tu bhagavantaṃ pūjya bhaktitaḥ |
strīṇāṃ vaśyakaraṃ mantraṃ duṣṭānāṃ tarjanaṃ tathā |
tad ahaṃ kathayāmy eṣa śṛṇu devi sukhaṃdade |
asya mantrasya yad bhūtaṃ vajrasattvena yat kṛtam |
bibhemi sutarāṃ devi uparodhāt tvayi kathyate || 41 ||

div.p: caturviṃśatinetrāya tadanu ṣoḍaśabhujāya | kṛṣṇajīmūtavapuṣe kapālamālānekadhāriṇe || adhyāntakrūracittāya ardhendudaṃṣṭriṇe || 46 ||
māraya māraya kāraya kāraya garjaya garjaya tarjaya tarjaya śoṣaya śoṣaya saptasāgarān bandha bandha nāgāṣṭakān gṛhṇa gṛhṇa śatrūn ha hā hi hī hu hū he hai ho hau haṃ haḥ phaṭ svāhā || 47 ||

lg.l: tatas tuṣṭā tu sā devī manthamanthānayogataḥ |
śāstā tatra mahājñānī maṇḍalaṃ likhati svayam |
tanmadhye tu likhet padmam aṣṭapatraṃ sakeśaram |
cakraṃ likhec ca nairṛtyāṃ vāyavyāṃ kuliśaṃ likhet || 53 ||
pūrvadvāre tathā kartrīṃ kṛpīṭaṃ dakṣiṇe likhet |
paścime saṃlikhet kūrmam uragaṃ cottare tathā || 54 ||

div.p: kiṃ bahunā pralāpena yathā tattvasaṃgrahe maṇḍalavidhis tathā karttavyam || 57 ||

lg.l: maṇḍale ca praveṣṭavyā vidyā cāṣṭau mahāsukhāḥ |
mātulasya tathā bhāryā mātṛbhaginī ca śvasṛkā |
pitur bhaginī tathā caiva aṣṭau vidyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 59 ||
karpūraṃ ca pibet tatra tena maṇḍalaṃ prokṣaṇam || 60 ||
tāsāṃ pāyayed yogī laghu siddhim avāpnuyāt |
tāṃ ca vivastrakāṃ kṛtvā bhagaṃ cumbayen muhurmuhuḥ |
tābhiś ca vṛṣyate bolaṃ gīyate nṛtyate param || 62 ||
abhiṣekaṃ dīyate tatra niśīthe vijane gṛhe || 64 ||
tat kṣaṇaṃ kīdṛśaṃ deva kathayasva mahāprabho || 67 ||
āi na anta na mahyu tahiṃ natra bhava natra nirvāṇa |
ehu so paramamahāsuha naü para naü appāṇa || 68 ||
svasavyetarapāṇais tu vṛddhā vānāmikā ca yā |
*kim apy utpadyate tatra mūrkhasya svapnaṃ yathā* |

div.p: hevajrābhyudayaḥ pañcamaḥ paṭalaḥ ||

lg.l: devīṃ vai gāḍham āliṅgya kṣiptvā bolaṃ kapālake |
śravaṇayoḥ kuṇḍalaṃ dhāryaṃ mantraṃ japtuṃ ca kaṇṭhikā |
rucakaṃ prāṇivadhaṃ tyaktuṃ mudrāṃ bhajituṃ ca mekhalam |
prahasanan tataḥ kṛtvā dantaiḥ saṃpīḍya cādharam |
pṛcchate tatra sā devī hevajraṃ sahajarūpiṇam || 5 ||
katareṇa vidhānena kayā kriyayā tathā prabho |
śavakeśasya kuccā ca likhanīyaṃ paṭaṃ guru || 7 ||
sūtraṃ ca yayā kāryaṃ kartavyañ ca paṭaṃ yayā |
aṅge niraṃśukaṃ bhūtvā nagnībhūya tathā punaḥ |

div.p: hevajrapaṭavidhānapaṭalaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ ||

lg.l: oṣṭhaṃ dantena saṃpīḍya kathaṃ bhavati pustakam ||
śṛṇu devi mahābhāge pustakaṃ kathayāmy aham |
pustakañ ca paṭañ caiva yadi vā dunduraḥ paśyati |
iha janmani na siddhiḥ syān na vā paralokagocare || 3 ||
śmaśāne girikuñje vā mānuṣasya pure tathā |
athavā vijane prānte idaṃ bhojanam ārabhet || 7 ||
sthānaṃ jñātvā yathāpūrvaṃ diśāsu vidiśāsu ca || 9 ||
bhakṣañ ca bhakṣayet tatra rājaśāliṃ prayatnataḥ |
bhuktvā bhuktvā punas tatra pūjyante tatra mātaraḥ || 10 ||
yadi vā mātā bhaginī bhāgineyī ca śvasṛkā |
gurave dadyān mahābhāgī vandayitvā svayaṃ pibet || 12 ||
muhurmuhuḥ praṇāmañ ca kurvanti tatra sādhakāḥ || 13 ||

div.p: bhojanapaṭalaḥ saptamaḥ ||

lg.l: tatra pṛcchanti yoginyo mahāmudrā tu kīdṛśī |
nātidīrghā nātihrasvā na kṛṣṇā na ca gaurikā |
padmaṃ cendīvaraṃ gandhaṃ kṛṣṇāt padmam ivācaret || 3 ||
tāṃ ca prāpya bhavet siddhiḥ sahajānandarūpiṇī || 5 ||
tatra tuṣṭā tu sā devī idaṃ vacanam abravīt |
durdāntā dundurāḥ sattvā vineyaṃ yānti kena hi || 8 ||
poṣadhaṃ dīyate prathamaṃ tadanu śikṣāpadaṃ daśam |
vaibhāṣyaṃ tatra deśeta sūtrāntaṃ vai punas tathā || 9 ||
yogācāraṃ tataḥ paścāt tadanu madhyamakaṃ diśet |
gṛhṇīyāt sādaraṃ śiṣyaḥ sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ || 10 ||

div.p: vineyapaṭalo nāmāṣṭaḥ ||

lg.l: māraṇaṃ kriyate kṛpayā śrāvayitvā gurau munau |
yatra dṛṣṭvā yathārūpam adhomukhaṃ tu bhāvayet |
tasya mārge sūcīṃ dhyāyāt praviśantīṃ vahnirūpiṇīm |
asmin tantre na hotavyaṃ mudrābandhakriyā na ca |
rahasyaṃ paramaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu devi varānane |
ayogyaḥ syād aviddhena viddhaḥ san rucidāyakaḥ || 8 ||
aviśuddhaṃ viṣatāṃ yāti viśuddhaṃ pīyūṣavad bhavet || 9 ||
yena rūpeṇa saṃbhūtaṃ tad ahaṃ vacmi śṛṇvatām || 10 ||
māṃsena pukkasī khyātā śavarī raktena kalpitā |
caṇḍālī śukram ity uktaṃ ḍombī ca medamajjayoḥ ||
yena mantreṇa jantūnāṃ karmāṇi yānti siddhitām || 14 ||
śṛṇu devi mahābhāge mantraṃ te kathayāmy aham || 15 ||
ādau vairocanaṃ dattvā ūṣmāṇāṃ ca caturthakam |
ādau varṇādhipaṃ dattvā tadanu khecarīṃ tataḥ |
svāhāntaṃ yojitaṃ kṛtvā buddhān api vaśīkaret || 17 ||
śūnyaṃ svāhāntaṃ yojayed buddhānām apy uccāṭayet || 18 ||
svāhāntaṃ ca punaḥ kṛtvā mārayet suramānuṣān || 22 ||
hrīḥkāraṃ yojayet tatra svāhāntaṃ punar ācaret |
ūṣmāṇāṃ ca caturthakaṃ pukkasyāś ca vibhūṣitam |

div.p: dviguṇīkṛtya pañcamasya tṛtīyaṃ dvitīyasya tṛtīyaṃ vahnibhūṣitam | hūṃkāratrayayojitam | pañcamasya dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyasya prathamaṃ svāhāntaṃ ṣaḍbhujasya mantraḥ || 31 ||
vairocanādi caturthasya prathamaṃ hutāśanasaṃyuktaṃ vetālīvibhūṣitam | antasthānāṃ tṛtīyakaṃ ghasmarībhūṣitam | prathamasya prathamam antasthānāṃ prathamena yuktaṃ vajrābhūṣitam || 32 ||
kṣakāraṃ caurībhūṣitam | pañcamasya prathamam | ūṣmāṇāṃ caturthakaṃ vajraḍākinībhūṣitam | śūnyākrāntaṃ triguṇitaṃ phaṭ svāhāntaṃ dvibhujasya || 33 ||

nairātmyā prathamasya prathamaṃ dvitīyasya prathamaṃ tṛtīyasya prathamaṃ caturthasya prathamaṃ pañcamasya prathamam antasthānāṃ prathamam ūṣmāṇāṃ prathamaṃ vairocanādi svāhāntam | purakṣobhanamantro lakṣajāpaḥ || 34 ||

antasthānāṃ dvitīyaṃ tu kṣakāradvayam | *madhye punar antasthānāṃ dvitīyakam* |
hūṃkāratrayaṃ vairocanādi phaṭkāravidarbhitaṃ svāhāntam | bhūmiśodhanamantraḥ || 35 ||
vairocanādi tadanu vajrā hūṃkārāntam | khānapānādhiṣṭhānamantraḥ || 36 ||
vairocanādi tadanu akāro mukham | ūṣmāṇāṃ tṛtīyakam | antasthānāṃ caturthakaṃ upari vahnibhūṣitam | dharmāṇāṃ tadanu vajrā cādyanutpannatvāt oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā | sarvabhautikabalimantraḥ || 37 ||
mantroddhārapaṭalo navamaḥ ||

lg.l: sphaṭikena stambhanaṃ jāpyaṃ vaśye ca raktacandanam |
stambhane kṣīrapānaṃ tu vaśye svacchandam ācaret |
māraṇe sihlakaṃ caiva ākṛṣṭau ca catuḥsamam || 4 ||
athavā antaśvam ādiśvaṃ nādiṃ gādiṃ hādiṃ tathaiva ca || 5 ||

div.p: jāpapaṭalo nāma daśamaḥ ||

lg.l: bhage liṅgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya ity āha cakranāyakaḥ |
anāmikāmūle yasya striyo vā puruṣasya vā |
yo hi yogī bhavet kṛṣṇo akṣobhyas tasya devatā |
yo hi yogī mahāgauro vairocanaḥ kuladevatā || 5 ||
yo hi yogī mahāśyāmo amoghas tasya devatā |
yo hi yogī mahāpiṅgo ratneśaḥ kuladevatā || 6 ||
raktagauro hi yo yogī amitābhaḥ kuladevatā |
śvetagauro hi yo yogī tasya vajrasattvakulaṃ bhavet || 7 ||
tathāgatānāṃ kulās te syū rūpam āśritya sāṃvṛtam || 8 ||
strīṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva yathā puṃsi tathaiva ca |
tāsām api kulās te syuḥ saṃvṛtyācārarūpataḥ || 9 ||
nairātmyāṃ bodhayām āsa śṛṇu devi prapūjanam || 10 ||
muhurmuhuḥ kāmayed vajrī adha ūrdhvaṃ nirīkṣayet |
karpūraṃ pīyate tatra madanaṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ |

div.p: sahajārthapaṭalo nāmaikadeśaḥ ||

lg.l: yathā buddhair atītais tu sicyante bodhiputrakāḥ |
gṛhṇa gṛhṇa mahāsattva gṛhītvā pūjanaṃ kuru || 3 ||
virajaṃ mokṣadaṃ śāntaṃ pitā te tvam asi svayam || 4 ||
caturānandasvabhāga viśva hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me || 5 ||
khagamukhaikaraso nātha hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ kāryaṃ kuruṣva me |
śirasi oṃkāraṃ hṛdi hūṃkāraṃ kiñjalke ākāram || 6 ||

div.p: mahātantrarājamāyākalpo dvitīyaḥ ||
